How to Use Chromedriver

  1. Click on the Windows or Mac icon to download Chromedriver.
  2. Unzip the downloaded file.
  3. Note the path to chromedriver.exe (or chromedriver for Mac).
  4. Copy that path and paste it into the Chromedriver Path input field in this app.
